text: Odo Marquard (26 February 1928 - 9 May 2015) was a German philosopher. Marquard was born in Stolp, Farther Pomerania. In 1984 he was awarded the Sigmund Freud Prize by the Deutsche Akademie f√ºr Sprache und Dichtung. Marquard died at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:20th-century German philosophers Category:21st- century German philosophers Category:German academics Category:People from former German territories
title: Odo Marquard
